column1: The Pit Room////Visiting some friends in Houston and this was the first stop that they took us to eat. We went to the Pit Room for lunch! Boy! I'm glad they brought us here. It was delicious. I'm not a big fan of okra
column2: but their okra is delicious and full of flavor...I definitely wish I had some right now. Their sausage and brisket were amazing
column3: great BBQ. I understand why the door is outside of the door
column4: but they get the line moving pretty quickly.
